sentences.en: " He is two feet longer than the skiff. " the old man said.
sentences.cn: “ 它比这小船还长两英尺, ” 老人说.

sentences.en: " Pedrico is looking after the skiff and the gear.
sentences.cn: “ 佩德里科在看守小船和打鱼的家什.

sentences.en: A small bird came toward the skiff from the north.
sentences.cn: 一只小鸟从北方朝小船飞来.

sentences.en: All lights were out when he sailed into the little harbor and beached his skiff.
sentences.cn: 当他划进小港，让小船冲上沙滩时，岸上的灯火都已灭了。

sentences.en: But he cannot pull this skiff forever, no matter how great he is.
sentences.cn: 然而不管它力气多大,总不能永远拖着这条小船跑吧.

sentences.en: He settled the sack around his shoulders and put the skiff on her course.
sentences.cn: 他把麻袋在肩头围围好,使小船顺着航线驶去.

sentences.en: He was so big it was like lashing a much bigger skiff alongside.
sentences.cn: 它真大,简直像在船边绑上了另一只大得多的船.

sentences.en: Huck, I'll take you right to it in a skiff.
sentences.cn: 哈克, 我马上带你划小船过去.

sentences.en: May I have the use of your skiff?
sentences.cn: 我可以借用一下您的小艇吗？

sentences.en: Pedrico is looking after the skiff and gear.
sentences.cn: 彼得利科在守着船和船上的东西.

sentences.en: Raw spray whiplashes the skiff, freezing as It'strikes.
sentences.cn: 湿冷的浪花抽打着小船, 随打随冻成冰.

sentences.en: Skiff Miller shook his head, no longer belligerent, but kindly.
sentences.cn: 斯基夫·米勒摇了摇头, 但态度已从敌对转为友好.

sentences.en: Skiff Miller was rounding the curve.
The skiff was dancing at the stern.
They were headed straight for the skiff swimming side by side.
sentences.cn: 它们笔直地并肩朝小船游来.

sentences.en: Tom Sawyer was in the skiff that bore Judge Thatcher.
sentences.cn: 汤姆-索亚和撒切尔法官同乘一条小艇.

sentences.en: We have cut them down to a skiff now.
sentences.cn: 我们搞得他们只剩一条小艇了.

trans.tran_cn: 小艇，小型帆船，摩托小快艇
trans.tran_en: a small light boat for one person
